UCI-Ware

Play Now!
My role:

Team Lead, Gameplay Designer, Artist

March 2023 - June 2023 (4 Months)

  • Created a WarioWare-inspired game based on the daily lives of UC Irvine students.
  • Led a team with deliberate decisions and a unified vision to harbor an efficient development process.
  • Delegated tasks and scheduled meetings for a team of over 10 people, ensuring to meet deadlines.
  • Established design and art pipelines to streamline microgame implementation, improving production.
